GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: bloomer
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in textile production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate textiles on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: chunker
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in textile production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate textiles on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: boomer
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in chemfuel production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate chemfuel on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: slimer
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in filth disposal. Under human influence, it can help keep areas clean.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: spitter
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste with toxic spit that is specialized in aggression and damage-dealing attacks. Though it can do tremendous damage, it is vulnerable to attacks itself. And very slow compared to its siblings.

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: treant
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in being a terrifying force amongst all dryad castes. It is an embodiment of the tree itself in ways. Armed with sharp roots, thick bark, and a paralyzing glare, the Treant is unmatched.
